channel.title: ScanX – Stocks
channel.description: Auto-generated feed for ScanX Stocks news

item.title: ADDI Industries Limited Announces Major Board Restructuring with New Director Appointments
item.description: Top News ADDI Industries Limited Announces Major Board Restructuring with New Director Appointments 2 minutes ago ADDI Industries Limited executed comprehensive board restructuring on December 11, 2025, with four new director appointments and six resignations including the Managing Director and CFO. The changes stem from a management control transition under a Share Purchase Agreement dated May 20, 2025, with all board committees reconstituted under new leadership.

item.title: Nifty and Sensex Close in Green: Market Wrap for December 11, 2025
item.description: Nifty and Sensex Close in Green: Market Wrap for December 11, 2025 2 hours ago Indian stock markets ended positively on December 11, with Nifty 50 up 0.55% at 25,898.55 and Sensex rising 0.51% to 84,818.13. Market breadth was bullish with 2,597 advancing stocks out of 4,548 traded. Key buzzing stocks included InterGlobe Aviation, Biocon Biologics, and Kaynes Technology, driven by company-specific news and analyst actions.

item.title: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price
item.description: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price 22 hours ago Vidya Wires Limited debuted on BSE at ₹52.13 per share, trading above its IPO issue price of ₹52.00. The listing reflects a modest premium of ₹0.13, representing approximately 0.25% gains over the offer price. The successful market debut enables regular trading of the company's shares on the exchange.

item.title: Novelix Pharmaceuticals Board Approves ₹15 Crore Preferential Allotment
item.description: Novelix Pharmaceuticals Board Approves ₹15 Crore Preferential Allotment just now Novelix Pharmaceuticals Limited's board has approved a preferential allotment of 25,00,000 equity shares at ₹60.00 per share to raise ₹15.00 crores. The allocation covers 40 investors including promoter group members and non-promoters, with the largest allocation of 3,25,000 shares going to promoter group member Pavani Vupparapalli. An Extraordinary General Meeting is scheduled for January 9, 2026, to seek shareholder approval for this capital raising initiative.
